participant_1.background:
The most valued possession I have is my collection of rocks because they remind me of the places I've been and the people I've met.
I am a creative person who loves to make my nails look their best.
i am in debt.
I now enjoy gardening and cooking with my favorite ingredients.
my car is black.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the sense of accomplishment and joy that comes from cooking a delicious meal for my family and friends.
I am proud of my passion for swimming and how it has helped me to stay healthy and active.
I can't live without my friends, especially when we go out for pizza together.
i am an omnivore.
I think of silly nicknames for my older brother, and then I start to wonder if people are thinking nice things about him when they hear them.

content.text: Hey there!  How are you today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing great! I'm just hanging out, making dinner and chatting with friends online.
That sounds like a lovely way to spend the evening.  I'm actually in the middle of cooking dinner myself!
What are you making?
I'm making a pizza!  I love cooking and baking, and I'm really proud of my pizza skills.
That sounds delicious!  I love pizza too.  I'm more of a cook than a baker, but I do love making simple desserts.
Simple desserts are the best!  I love making brownies and cookies.
Me too!  I'm a sucker for chocolate anything.
Same here!  I'm trying to cut back on chocolate, but it's so hard.
I know the feeling!  It's one of my favorite foods.
Well, at least we can enjoy it together!  What's your favorite kind of pizza?
I love pepperoni pizza!  What's yours?
I love pepperoni pizza too!  My favorite is pepperoni and pineapple.
Oh wow, that's an interesting combination!  I've never tried it before.
You should!  It's really good.  I think the sweetness of the pineapple goes really well with the salty pepperoni.
I'll have to try it sometime!  Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem!  I'm glad I could help.
Well, I should probably get back to my dinner.  It's almost done!
Okay!  Enjoy your dinner!
Thanks!  You too
